file_content.text: The Killik mounds appear to be placed strategically! Did you read my latest report?
I did. Twenty pages of anthropological nonsense and not one new weapon design.
You were brought here to help destroy these bugs, not conduct a science project.
But they're fascinating creatures, sir. If I had one to dissect, I could--
This is war. Tell me how to win, or I'm shipping you back to Dromund Kaas.
